name: Ruins of The Forgotten Tribe
description:
Find the hidden treasure of the tainos!

You will spawn in a random location, your objective is to open the door to the final treasure.
To do so you must pick up the keys laying around the level in order to proceed. Each key is marked with an icon that corresponds to a specific door.

WASD/Left Joystick - Move

Mouse/Right Joy - Camera

M2/RT - Aim

M1/LT - Use

Shift/RS - Run

Esc/Start - Pause
